abstract: Thursday’s highlights of overlooked, unusual or just plain interesting technology news from around the Web.

lead_paragraph: Thursday’s highlights from our “What We’re Reading” feature, in which New York Times technology journalists point out interesting articles they have spotted on the Web:

headline.main: What We’re Reading: Patents, E-Books and Spy Software
